className.description: Additional classes for the pagination navigation container.

currPageAriaLabel.description: Accessible label for the input displaying the current page.

firstPage.description: The number of first page where pagination starts.

isCompact.description: Flag indicating if the pagination is compact.

isDisabled.description: Flag indicating if the pagination is disabled.

lastPage.description: The number of the last page.

onFirstClick.description: Function called when user clicks to navigate to first page. (Function: (event: React.SyntheticEvent<HTMLButtonElement>, page: number) => void)

onLastClick.description: Function called when user clicks to navigate to last page. (Function: (event: React.SyntheticEvent<HTMLButtonElement>, page: number) => void)

onNextClick.description: Function called when user clicks to navigate to next page. (Function: (event: React.SyntheticEvent<HTMLButtonElement>, page: number) => void)

onPageInput.description: Function called when user inputs page number. (Function: (event: React.KeyboardEvent<HTMLInputElement>, page: number) => void)

onPreviousClick.description: Function called when user clicks to navigate to previous page. (Function: (event: React.SyntheticEvent<HTMLButtonElement>, page: number) => void)

onSetPage.description:
Function called when page is changed. (Type: (
  event: React.MouseEvent | React.KeyboardEvent | MouseEvent,
  newPage: number,
  perPage?: number,
  startIdx?: number,
  endIdx?: number
) => void)

page.description: The number of the current page.

pagesTitle.description: The title of a page displayed beside the page number.

pagesTitlePlural.description: The title of a page displayed beside the page number (the plural form).

paginationAriaLabel.description: Accessible label for the pagination component.

toFirstPageAriaLabel.description: Accessible label for the button which moves to the first page.

toLastPageAriaLabel.description: Accessible label for the button which moves to the last page.

toNextPageAriaLabel.description: Accessible label for the button which moves to the next page.

toPreviousPageAriaLabel.description: Accessible label for the button which moves to the previous page.
